foreignData.flavorText: "Sin duda los árbitros te encerrarían, después de que se firmasen todos los documentos. Pero yo tendré justicia ¡ahora" —Alóvnek, mago del Gremio Boros
foreignData.name: Condenar
foreignData.text: Pon la criatura atacante objetivo en el fondo de la biblioteca de su propietario. Su controlador gana vida igual a su resistencia.

foreignData.flavorText: « Les Arbitres vous mettront sûrement en prison une fois que tous les documents seront signés. Mais je veux que justice soit faite sur le champ » —Alovnek, ghildmage de Boros
foreignData.name: Condamnation
foreignData.text: Mettez la créature attaquante ciblée au-dessous de la bibliothèque de son propriétaire. Son contrôleur gagne un nombre de points de vie égal à son endurance.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non ho dubbi che i giudici ti rinchiuderebbero, una volta firmati tutti i documenti. Ma io otterrò giustizia adesso" —Alovnek, maga della gilda Boros
foreignData.name: Condannare
foreignData.text: Metti una creatura attaccante bersaglio in fondo al grimorio del suo proprietario. Il suo controllore guadagna un ammontare di punti vita pari alla sua costituzione.

foreignData.flavorText: 判事どもなら、全部の書類に署名して、それから判決といくんだろう。 だが、俺が裁きを下すのは今だ！ ――ボロスのギルド魔道士、アラヴネク
foreignData.name: 糾弾
foreignData.text: 攻撃に参加しているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーのライブラリーの一番下に置く。 それのコントローラーは、それのタフネスに等しい点数のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: "Sem dúvida os árbitros darão um fim a você, depois que todos os documentos forem assinados. Mas eu terei justiça agora" —Alovnek, maga da guilda Boros
foreignData.name: Condenar
foreignData.text: Coloca a criatura alvo atacante no fundo do grimório de seu dono. Seu controlador ganha uma quantidade de pontos de vida igual à resistência dela.

foreignData.flavorText: "Разумеется, верховные судьи засадили бы тебя после подписания всех документов. Но я добьюсь правосудия сейчас" — Аловнек, маг гильдии Боросов
foreignData.name: Осуждение
foreignData.text: Поместите целевое нападающее существо в низ библиотеки его владельца. Контролирующий его игрок получает количество жизни, равное его здоровью.

foreignData.flavorText: 「既然需签署的文件一无遗漏，仲裁者当然会放过你。 但我现在就要主持正义！」 ～波洛斯公会法师阿劳涅
foreignData.name: 判罪
foreignData.text: 将目标进行攻击的生物置于其拥有者的牌库底。 其操控者获得等同于其防御力的生命。

cards.name: Condemn
cards.originalText: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

rulings.text: The affected creature's last known existence on the battlefield is checked to determine its toughness.

cards.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

cards.flavorText: Confront her, and feel the hooves of her steed. Ignore her, and feel the sting of her arrow.

foreignData.flavorText: Wer sich ihr entgegenstellt, bekommt die Hufe ihres Reittiers zu spüren. Wer sie ignoriert, bekommt einen Pfeil in die Rippen.
foreignData.name: Pfeilschnelle Equidonautin
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Solange die Pfeilschnelle Equidonautin verzaubert ist, hat sie „{T}: Die Pfeilschnelle Equidonautin fügt einer angreifenden oder blockenden Kreatur deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu."

foreignData.flavorText: Enfréntala, y siente los cascos de su montura. Ignórala, y siente la punzada de sus flechas.
foreignData.name: Equinauta errante
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Mientras la Equinauta errante esté encantada, tiene "{T}: La Equinauta errante hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura atacante o bloqueadora objetivo."

foreignData.flavorText: Attaquez-la, et vous connaîtrez la blessure des sabots de son destrier. Ignorez-la, et sa flèche percera votre chair.
foreignData.name: Équénaute librevent
foreignData.text:
Vol
Tant que l'Équénaute librevent est enchantée, elle a « {T} : L'Équénaute librevent inflige 2 blessures à la créature attaquante ou bloqueuse ciblée. »

foreignData.flavorText: Affrontala e assaggerai gli zoccoli del suo destriero. Ignorala e assaggerai la punta della sua freccia.
foreignData.name: Equinauta del Ventolibero
foreignData.text:
Volare
Fintanto che è incantata, l'Equinauta del Ventolibero ha "{T}: L'Equinauta del Ventolibero infligge 2 danni a una creatura bersaglio attaccante o bloccante."

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女に立ち向かえば、馬の蹄を味わうことになる。 彼女を無視すれば、矢の痛みを味わうことになる。
foreignData.name: 自由風の乗馬兵
foreignData.text:
飛行
自由風の乗馬兵がエンチャントされているかぎり、それは「{T}：攻撃やブロックに参加しているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。自由風の乗馬兵はそれに２点のダメージを与える。」の能力を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・射手

foreignData.flavorText: Confronte-a, e enfrentará os cascos de seu cavalo. Ignore-a, e sentirá a pontada de sua flecha.
foreignData.name: Viajante Eqüestre do Vento
foreignData.text:
Voar
Enquanto Viajante Eqüestre do Vento estiver encantada, ela tem "{T}: Viajante Eqüestre do Vento causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura alvo atacante ou bloqueadora."

foreignData.flavorText: Только встань на ее пути — и почувствуешь на себе копыта ее скакуна. Не обращай на нее внимания — и получишь жалящий укол ее стрелы.
foreignData.name: Эквенавт вольного ветра
foreignData.text:
Полет
Пока Эквенавт вольного ветра зачарована, она получает способность "{T}: Эквенавт вольного ветра наносит 2 повреждения целевому нападающему или блокирующему существу".

foreignData.flavorText: 与她对抗，便将挨其飞蹄。 与她远离，便将受其飞箭。
foreignData.name: 滑翔飞马骑士
foreignData.text:
飞行
只要滑翔飞马骑士上结附了结界，它便具有「{T}：滑翔飞马骑士对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成2点伤害。」

cards.name: Freewind Equenaut
cards.originalText:
Flying
As long as Freewind Equenaut is enchanted, it has "{T}: Freewind Equenaut deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature."
cards.text:
Flying
As long as Freewind Equenaut is enchanted, it has "{T}: Freewind Equenaut deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature."

cards.flavorText: The magic of the Guildpact gives aegis to the spirits pressed into its service. Upon entering the afterlife, they find new focus and are charged with defending the Guildpact against those who would see it broken.

foreignData.flavorText: Durch die Magie des Gildenpakts übernehmen die Geister die Ägide über den Bund. Sobald sie ins Jenseits eintreten, erhält ihr Dasein einen neuen Sinn, und sie verteidigen den Gildenbund gegen diejenigen, die ihn entzweit sehen wollen.
foreignData.name: Bewahrer des Gildenbunds
foreignData.text: Schutz vor allem Einfarbigen

foreignData.flavorText: La magia del Pacto entre Gremios le da égida a los espíritus a su servicio. Después de entrar en la otra vida, encuentran un nuevo objetivo y se les encarga defender el Pacto contra aquellos que atentan contra él.
foreignData.name: Guardián del Pacto entre Gremios
foreignData.text: Protección contra monocolor.

foreignData.flavorText: La magie du Pacte des Guildes met les esprits qui le servent sous son égide. Arrivés dans l'au-delà, ils trouvent une nouvelle raison d'être et défendent le Pacte des Guildes contre ceux qui veulent le briser.
foreignData.name: Vigile du Pacte des Guildes
foreignData.text: Protection contre le monocolore

foreignData.flavorText: La magia del Patto delle Gilde dona protezione agli spiriti costretti a servire il patto stesso. Una volta entrati nell'aldilà, essi vengono riassegnati e incaricati di difendere il Patto delle Gilde da coloro che vorrebbero spezzarlo.
foreignData.name: Guardia del Patto delle Gilde
foreignData.text: Protezione dai monocolore

foreignData.flavorText: ギルドパクトの魔法は、しもべとして働く精霊に庇護を与えている。 彼らは死後に新しい使命、すなわちギルドパクトが間違っていると思う人物からそれを守る役割を与えられる。
foreignData.name: ギルドパクトの守護者
foreignData.text: プロテクション（単色）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.flavorText: A mágica do Pacto das Guildas concede proteção aos espíritos oprimidos ao seu serviço. Ao entrar na vida após a morte, eles descobrem um novo foco e são encarregados de defender o Pacto das Guildas contra os que anseiam pelo seu fim.
foreignData.name: Guardião do Pacto das Guildas
foreignData.text: Proteção contra monocoloridas

foreignData.flavorText: Магия Договора гильдий дает защиту духам, вынужденным служить ему. В загробном мире они находят новое призвание, и их миссия — защищать Договор гильдий от всех, кто попытается его нарушить.
foreignData.name: Страж Договора гильдий
foreignData.text: Защита от одноцветного

foreignData.flavorText: 十会盟的法术替受命效力的精魂提供屏障。 进入来生之后，他们找到新的目标，立志将意图破坏十会盟者全数击灭。
foreignData.name: 十会盟守护者
foreignData.text: 反单色保护

cards.name: Guardian of the Guildpact
cards.originalText: Protection from monocolored
cards.text: Protection from monocolored

cards.flavorText: "This aura threatens the sanctity of your soul. Wrenching it free won't be easy on either of us. If you're ready, we'll begin."

foreignData.flavorText: „Diese Aura bedroht die Unverletzlichkeit deiner Seele. Es wird für keinen von uns einfach werden, dich ihr zu entreißen. Wenn du bereit bist, werden wir beginnen."
foreignData.name: Haazda-Entlediger
foreignData.text: {T}, opfere den Haazda-Entlediger: Zerstöre eine Aura deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: "Este aura amenaza la santidad de tu alma. Extraerla no será fácil para ninguno de los dos. Si estás listo, comenzaremos."
foreignData.name: Exoneradora haazda
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrificar la Exoneradora haazda: Destruye el aura objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Cette aura menace la vertu de votre âme. L'arracher ne sera facile ni pour vous, ni pour moi. Nous commencerons dès que vous serez prêt. »
foreignData.name: Exonératrice d'Haazda
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifiez l'Exonératrice d'Haazda : Détruisez l'aura ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quest'aura minaccia la santità della tua anima. Liberarla non sarà facile per nessuno di noi due. Se sei pronto, possiamo cominciare."
foreignData.name: Esoneratrice Haazda
foreignData.text: {T}, Sacrifica l'Esoneratrice Haazda: Distruggi un'Aura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: この力はあなたの魂の神聖さを脅かしているわ。 それを外すのは、私たちどっちにとっても楽なものじゃないの。 準備ができたら、始めるわね。
foreignData.name: ハズダーの免罪人
foreignData.text: {T}, ハズダーの免罪人を生け贄に捧げる：オーラ１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック

foreignData.flavorText: "Esta aura ameaça a pureza da sua alma. Liberar-se dela não será fácil para nenhum de nós. Se estiver pronto, podemos começar."
foreignData.name: Absolvedora Haazda
foreignData.text: {T}, Sacrifique Absolvedora Haazda: Destrua a Aura alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: "Эта Аура угрожает святыне твоей души. Ее искоренение будет непростым для нас обоих. Если ты готов, приступим."
foreignData.name: Хаазда Освободительница
foreignData.text: {T}, Пожертвуйте Хаазду Освободительницу: Уничтожьте целевую Ауру.

foreignData.flavorText: 「这灵气会污染你的心灵。 若想将它褪除，对我俩均非易事。 如果你已准备妥当，我们这就开始。」
foreignData.name: 哈资达退障师
foreignData.text: {T}，牺牲哈资达退障师：消灭目标灵气。

cards.name: Haazda Exonerator
cards.originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Haazda Exonerator: Destroy target Aura.
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Haazda Exonerator: Destroy target Aura.

cards.flavorText: The Haazda shield is broad, protecting both the free and the guilded.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Schild der Haazda ist breit genug, um sowohl die Freien als auch die Angehörigen der Gilden zu beschützen.
foreignData.name: Haazda-Schildkamerad
foreignData.text:
Opfere den Haazda-Schildkameraden zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments, falls du nicht {W}{W} bezahlst.
{W}: Das nächste Mal, dass dir eine Quelle, die du bestimmst, in diesem Zug Schaden zufügen würde, verhindere diesen Schaden.

foreignData.flavorText: El escudo haazda es amplio, protegiendo tanto al libre como al agremiado.
foreignData.name: Escudero asistente haazda
foreignData.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, sacrifica el Escudero asistente haazda a menos que pagues {W}{W}.
{W}: La próxima vez que una fuente de tu elección fuera a hacerte daño este turno, prevén ese daño.

foreignData.flavorText: Le bouclier d'Haazda est suffisamment grand pour protéger les hommes libres et les membres des guildes.
foreignData.name: Compagnon de bouclier d'Haazda
foreignData.text:
Au début de votre entretien, sacrifiez le Compagnon de bouclier d'Haazda à moins que vous ne payiez {W}{W}.
{W} : La prochaine fois qu'une source de votre choix devrait vous blesser ce tour-ci, prévenez ces blessures.

foreignData.flavorText: Lo scudo degli Haazda è grande, così da proteggere sia le creature libere sia quelle gildate.
foreignData.name: Compagno di Scudo Haazda
foreignData.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, sacrifica il Compagno di Scudo Haazda a meno che tu spenda {W}{W}.
{W}: La prossima volta che una fonte a tua scelta ti sta per infliggere danno in questo turno, previeni quel danno.

foreignData.flavorText: ハズダーの盾は幅広く、ギルドもそうでない者も共に守る。
foreignData.name: ハズダーの盾兵
foreignData.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたが{W}{W}を支払わないかぎり、ハズダーの盾兵を生け贄に捧げる。
{W}：このターン、次にあなたが選んだいずれかの発生源１つがあなたに与えるダメージをすべて軽減し、０にする。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: O escudo de Haazda é abrangente, protegendo tanto os indivíduos livres quanto os membros das guildas.
foreignData.name: Escudeiro Haazda
foreignData.text:
No início de sua manutenção, sacrifique Escudeiro Haazda, a menos que você pague {W}{W}.
{W}: Na próxima vez que uma fonte de sua escolha fosse lhe causar dano neste turno, previna aquele dano.

foreignData.flavorText: Широк щит Хаазды: он защищает и тех, кто в гильдиях, и тех, кто вне их.
foreignData.name: Щитоносец Хаазды
foreignData.text:
В начале вашего этапа поддержки пожертвуйте Щитоносца Хаазды или заплатите {W}{W}.
{W}: В следующий раз, когда выбранный вами источник в этот ход будет наносить вам повреждения, предотвратите эти повреждения.

foreignData.flavorText: 哈资达的盾牌不问对象，自由人与入会者均可受其庇护。
foreignData.name: 哈资达护盾手
foreignData.text:
在你的维持开始时，除非你支付{W}{W}，否则牺牲哈资达护盾手。
{W}：选择一个来源，于本回合中，防止该来源下一次将对你造成的伤害。

{W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

foreignData.text:
Immer wenn der Paladin von Prahv Schaden zufügt, erhältst du ebenso viele Lebenspunkte dazu.
Vorhersage {1}{W}, zeige den Paladin von Prahv aus deiner Hand offen vor: Immer wenn eine Kreatur deiner Wahl in diesem Zug Schaden zufügt, erhältst du entsprechend viele Lebenspunkte dazu. (Spiele diese Fähigkeit nur während deines Versorgungssegments und nur einmal in jedem Zug.)

foreignData.text:
Siempre que el Paladín de Prahv haga daño, gana esa cantidad de vida.

foreignData.name: Paladin de Prahv
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que le Paladin de Prahv inflige des blessures, vous gagnez autant de points de vie.
Prévision — {1}{W}, révélez le Paladin de Prahv depuis votre main : À chaque fois que la créature ciblée inflige des blessures ce tour-ci, vous gagnez autant de points de vie. (Ne jouez cette capacité que pendant votre entretien et qu'une seule fois par tour.)

foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta il Paladino di Prahv infligge danno, tu guadagni altrettanti punti vita.
Previsione {1}{W}, Rivela il Paladino di Prahv dalla tua mano: Ogniqualvolta la creatura bersaglio infligge danno in questo turno, guadagni altrettanti punti vita. (Gioca questa abilità solo durante il tuo mantenimento e solo una volta per turno.)

foreignData.name: プラーフの聖騎士

予見 ― {1}{W}, あなたの手札からプラーフの聖騎士を公開する：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それがダメージを与えるたび、あなたはその点数に等しい点数のライフを得る。 （この能力はあなたのアップキープにのみ、各ターンに１回のみプレイできる。）

foreignData.text:
Каждый раз, когда Паладин Права наносит повреждения, вы получаете столько же жизни.
Предвидение {1}{W}, Покажите Паладина Права из вашей руки: Каждый раз, когда целевое существо в этот ход наносит повреждения, вы получаете столько же жизней. (Разыгрывайте эту способность только во время своего этапа поддержки и только один раз за ход.)

foreignData.name: 布拉夫神圣武士

rulings.text: If the ability is activated and Cytoplast Manipulator leaves the battlefield before it resolves, the ability does nothing. The target creature will remain under its current controller’s control.

cards.name: Psychic Possession
cards.originalText:
Enchant opponent
Skip your draw step.
Whenever enchanted opponent draws a card, you may draw a card.

rulings.text: An Aura with enchant opponent can’t be attached to a permanent.

Enchanting an opponent works very much like enchanting a permanent. The Aura spell targets the opponent. When it resolves, it enters the battlefield “attached” to that player. Once it’s on the battlefield, it no longer targets that player.
If Psychic Possession’s controller ever happens to be the player it’s enchanting, Psychic Possession will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action.

In a multiplayer game, if the enchanted opponent leaves the game, Psychic Possession will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action. If Psychic Possession’s owner leaves the game, Psychic Possession immediately leaves the game; this is not a state-based action.
Psychic Possession’s controller, not the enchanted player, skips their draw step.

cards.name: Nightcreep
cards.originalText: Until end of turn, all creatures become black and all lands become Swamps.

rulings.text: A land or creature that enters the battlefield after Nightcreep resolves won’t be affected by it.

If a permanent is both a creature and a land, Nightcreep replaces all of its land types with Swamp, but it doesn’t affect its creature types. The creature land loses all abilities generated by its rules text and its previous land types but retains any abilities granted to it by other effects. For example, an animated Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a black creature land with the land subtype Swamp whose only abilities are flying and “{T}: Add {B}.”
This effect overwrites all creatures’ colors. Creatures will be black instead of any other color or colors.

This effect overwrites all lands’ land types. Lands will be Swamps instead of any other land types. This won’t affect a land’s supertypes (such as basic or legendary). Lands will lose their normal abilities and have the ability “{T}: Add {B}” instead.

cards.text: Until end of turn, all creatures become black and all lands become Swamps.

rulings.text: If multiple creatures enter the battlefield at the same time, Flame-Kin War Scout’s ability will trigger multiple times. When the first of these triggers resolves, if Flame Kin War Scout can be sacrificed by the ability’s controller, it will be sacrificed and deal 4 damage. When the other triggers resolve, it won’t be on the battlefield, so it can’t be sacrificed and the other creatures won’t be dealt any damage.

cards.name: Kindle the Carnage
cards.originalText: Discard a card at random. If you do, Kindle the Carnage deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature. You may repeat this process any number of times.

rulings.text: A creature that’s been dealt lethal damage by an iteration of this effect will remain on the battlefield and be dealt more damage by any further iterations. After you stop, all creatures that have been dealt lethal damage are put into their owners’ graveyards at the same time.
A single regeneration shield is sufficient to save a particular creature, no matter how many instances of damage are on it.

All the damage has the same source. However, each iteration of this process is a separate instance of damage. An effect that prevents damage the “next time” this card would deal it will prevent damage from only one iteration.
Any damage prevention or regeneration abilities must be activated before Kindle the Carnage starts resolving in order to have any effect. You can’t wait to see which (if any) cards are discarded.

You decide whether to repeat the process after each iteration. In other words, you discard a card, see what it is, Kindle the Carnage deals damage, then you decide whether to continue. If so, you discard a card, see what it is, Kindle the Carnage deals damage, then you decide whether to continue, and so on.

cards.text: Discard a card at random. If you do, Kindle the Carnage deals damage equal to that card's mana value to each creature. You may repeat this process any number of times.

cards.name: War's Toll
cards.originalText:
Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, tap all lands that player controls.
If a creature an opponent controls attacks, all creatures that opponent controls attack if able.

rulings.text: Your opponent can tap lands for mana in response to the triggered ability. The effect won’t prevent your opponent from casting spells or activating abilities, but it will make it difficult for that player to cast other spells or activate abilities later in the turn because players’ mana pools empty at the end of each step.

If its mana cost is {X}{G}, this Aura’s controller adds {G} to their mana pool. cards.name: Flash Foliage
cards.originalText:
Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play blocking target creature attacking you.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Flash Foliage can be cast only during an opponent’s combat phase, after attackers have been declared. If it’s cast after combat damage is dealt, the Saproling will enter the battlefield blocking the attacking creature, but will neither deal combat damage to it nor be dealt combat damage by it.
Putting a blocking creature onto the battlefield doesn’t trigger “When this creature blocks” abilities. It also won’t check blocking restrictions, costs, or requirements.

Putting a blocking creature onto the battlefield will trigger “When this creature becomes blocked by a creature” abilities. It may trigger “When this creature becomes blocked” abilities, but only if the creature the Saproling is blocking had not yet been blocked that combat.
The Saproling token is blocking the attacking creature, even if the block couldn’t legally be declared (for example, if the attacking creature has flying, or is Vindictive Mob).
The target creature can be blocked by other creatures.
With the latest Oracle update, you can only cast this during combat, after blockers have been declared.
If a turn has multiple combat phases, this spell can be cast during any of them as long as it’s after the beginning of that phase’s Declare Blockers Step.

cards.text:
Cast this spell only during combat after blockers are declared.
Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token that's blocking target creature attacking you.

cards.name: Protean Hulk
cards.originalText: When Protean Hulk is put into a graveyard from play, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them into play. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: If a card in your library has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

You can find any number of creature cards, so long as their total mana value is 6 or less. For example, you could find eight creature cards with mana value 0 and three with mana value 2, but you couldn't find two with mana value 4.

cards.text: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total mana value 6 or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

rulings.text: A token copy of Sprouting Phytohydra is created even if the damage dealt to Sprouting Phytohydra destroys it.

If Cytoshape turns a creature into a copy of Sprouting Phytohydra, and that creature is dealt damage, the token that is put onto the battlefield is simply a copy of Sprouting Phytohydra. If a token copy of Sprouting Phytohydra is dealt damage, it will create another token copy.

cards.name: Anthem of Rakdos
cards.originalText:
Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn and Anthem of Rakdos deals 1 damage to you.
Hellbent As long as you have no cards in hand, if a source you control would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.

rulings.text: If a source you control would deal damage to multiple creatures and/or players simultaneously, all of that damage is doubled.

If damage that would be dealt to a player or creature is affected by both Anthem of Rakdos and a damage prevention effect, that player or that creature’s controller chooses the order to apply the effects. In most cases that player will want to prevent damage, then double what’s left.
The first ability triggers once for each creature you attack with. If you attack with three creatures, for example, they’ll each get +2/+0 and you’ll be dealt 3 damage.
The hellbent ability doubles the damage dealt to you by Anthem of Rakdos itself.

rulings.text: Azorius First-Wing doesn’t have protection from creatures that are enchanted.
If an effect tries to move an Aura onto this creature, the effect will fail and the Aura will stay where it was.

“Protection from enchantments” means that Azorius First-Wing can’t be enchanted, it can’t be targeted by Aura spells or by abilities of enchantments, all damage that would be dealt to it by enchantments is prevented, and it can’t be blocked by creatures that are also enchantments.

cards.name: Cytoshape
cards.originalText: Choose a nonlegendary creature in play. Target creature becomes a copy of that creature until end of turn.

rulings.text: A creature may become a copy of itself this way. This generally won’t have any visible effect.
At the end of the turn, the creature reverts to what it was before. If two Cytoshapes affect the same creature on the same turn, they’ll both wear off at the same time.

Effects that have already applied to the target creature will continue to apply to it. For example, if Giant Growth had given it +3/+3 earlier in the turn, then Cytoshape makes it a copy of Grizzly Bears, it will be a 5/5 Grizzly Bears.

If the creature becomes a copy of a face-down creature, it will become a 2/2 creature with no name, creature type, abilities, mana cost, or color. It will not become face-down and thus can’t be turned face up.
If the creature copies a creature that’s copying a creature, it will become whatever the chosen creature is copying.
Only the creature that’s becoming a copy is targeted. The creature that it will copy isn’t chosen until Cytoshape resolves.

The creature copies the printed values of the chosen creature, plus any copy effects that have been applied to it. It won’t copy counters on that creature. It won’t copy effects that have changed the creature’s power, toughness, types, color, or so on.

This effect can cause the target to stop being a creature. For example, if it becomes a copy of an animated Blinkmoth Nexus, the printed wording will be copied and it will become an unanimated Blinkmoth Nexus.

Whenever Isperia the Inscrutable deals combat damage to a player, name a card. That player reveals his or her hand. If he or she reveals the named card, search your library for a creature card with flying, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: The card is named when the ability resolves. The named card can’t be played after it’s named but before the player’s hand is revealed.

cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Isperia the Inscrutable deals combat damage to a player, choose a card name. That player reveals their hand. If a card with the chosen name is revealed this way, search your library for a creature card with flying, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch
cards.originalText: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch deals 2 damage to target creature or player if the sacrificed creature was red. Draw a card if the sacrificed creature was black.

rulings.text: You can sacrifice any creature you control to pay for this ability. If the creature was neither red nor black, the ability has no effect.

You must choose a target for the ability, even if the creature you sacrifice isn’t red. If the target becomes illegal before the ability resolves, the ability won’t resolve; you won’t draw a card, even if the creature you sacrificed was black.

cards.text: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch deals 2 damage to any target if the sacrificed creature was red. Draw a card if the sacrificed creature was black.

cards.name: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary
cards.originalText:
Whenever you play a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever you play a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

rulings.text: If you cast a green and blue creature spell, both abilities will trigger. The abilities may be stacked so that when they resolve, you search your library for a creature card, put it on top of your library, and then put that card into your hand. The abilities may also be stacked in the other order, of course.

cards.text:
Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

cards.name: Omnibian
cards.originalText: {T}: Target creature becomes a 3/3 Frog until end of turn.

rulings.text: If the target creature has any counters on it that modify its power and toughness (such as a +1/+1 counter), those counters will continue to affect the creature after it becomes 3/3. In the example given, it will be 4/4.

If the target creature is affected by any effects that modify its power or toughness without setting them to specific values (such as from Giant Growth), Omnibian’s effect will be applied before those effects. In the example given, the creature will be 6/6.
This effect changes only the power, toughness, and creature type of the targeted creature. It does not cause that creature to lose any abilities.

cards.name: Rakdos the Defiler
cards.originalText:
Flying, trample
Whenever Rakdos the Defiler attacks, sacrifice half the non-Demon permanents you control, rounded up.
Whenever Rakdos deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices half the non-Demon permanents he or she controls, rounded up.

rulings.text: A permanent with the subtype Demon, including Rakdos the Defiler itself, can’t be sacrificed this way.

To calculate the number of permanents that must be sacrificed, count the number of permanents the affected player controls that don’t have the subtype Demon, then divide that number in half and round up. For example, a player who controls eleven non-Demon permanents will need to sacrifice six of them.

cards.text:

rulings.text: If a split card is cast, Dovescape makes tokens equal to the converted mana cost of the half that was cast.

The Bird tokens are created even if the spell isn’t countered by Dovescape’s ability. This may happen because the spell can’t be countered, because it’s already been countered, or because it’s otherwise been removed from the stack by the time Dovescape’s ability resolves.

rulings.text: This is not the same as hexproof. If, for example, you target one of your opponent's creatures, your opponents won't be able to target their own creature with spells or abilities.

If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Shielding Plax tries to resolve, the Aura spell doesn't resolve. It won't enter the battlefield, so its enters-the-battlefield ability won't trigger.

cards.name: Simic Guildmage
cards.originalText:
({GW} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.)
{1}{G}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller.
{1}{U}: Attach target Aura enchanting a permanent to another permanent with the same controller.

rulings.text: For the first ability, if the two target creatures aren’t controlled by the same player when the ability resolves, the ability does nothing. The player who controls the two creatures doesn’t have to be the same player who controlled them when the ability was activated, and that player doesn’t have to be Simic Guildmage’s controller.
For the first ability, the first target creature doesn’t need to have a +1/+1 counter on it. If it doesn’t, the ability does nothing.

For the second ability, only the Aura is targeted. When the ability resolves, you choose a permanent to move the Aura onto. It can’t be the permanent the Aura is already attached to, it must be controlled by the player who controls the permanent the Aura is attached to, and it must be able to be enchanted by the Aura. (It doesn’t matter who controls the Aura or who controls Simic Guildmage.) If no such permanent exists, the Aura doesn’t move.

cards.name: Bound // Determined
cards.originalText: Sacrifice a creature. Return up to X cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of colors that creature was. Then remove this card from the game.

rulings.text: After Determined resolves, any spells or abilities that would counter a spell you control that turn will still resolve. They just won’t counter that spell.
Spells you control may be countered by spells or abilities while Determined is on the stack, waiting to resolve.
The cards in the graveyard that you return as part of Bound’s effect aren’t targeted. They’re chosen when the spell resolves. The creature you sacrificed may be one of them.
The creature is sacrificed when Bound resolves. It’s not an additional cost. It’s not optional. If you can’t sacrifice a creature or a colorless creature is sacrificed, no cards are returned.

cards.name: Research // Development
cards.originalText: Choose up to four cards you own from outside the game and shuffle them into your library.

rulings.text: Development’s effect is repeated three times no matter which option the opponent chooses. The opponent may choose a different option each time. You’ll wind up with three Elemental tokens, two tokens and a card, one token and two cards, or three cards, whichever your opponent chooses.

In a multiplayer game, each opponent, in turn, has the option to let you draw a card. If no opponent does, you put a token onto the battlefield. Then the process repeats two more times. A different opponent may let you draw a card each time.

A card “from outside the game” may be a card from your collection or a card from your sideboard. In tournament play, you can’t choose a card from your collection. The cards you choose don’t all have to come from the same place.
The exile zone is a part of the game, so you can’t get exiled cards.

cards.name: Bronze Bombshell
cards.originalText: When a player other than Bronze Bombshell's owner controls it, that player sacrifices it. If the player does, Bronze Bombshell deals 7 damage to him or her.

rulings.text: Bronze Bombshell deals 7 damage only if it was sacrificed as a result of its ability. If it leaves the battlefield or changes controllers before the ability resolves, it can’t be sacrificed and won’t deal damage.

This ability is a state trigger. Once it triggers, it won’t trigger again while the ability is on the stack. If the triggered ability leaves the stack and the creature is still on the battlefield under the control of a player other than its owner, the ability will immediately trigger again.

cards.text: When a player other than Bronze Bombshell's owner controls it, that player sacrifices it. If the player does, Bronze Bombshell deals 7 damage to the player.

cards.name: Ghost Quarter
cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Ghost Quarter: Destroy target land. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put it into play, then shuffle his or her library.

rulings.text: If you target Ghost Quarter with its own ability, the ability won't resolve because its target is no longer on the battlefield. You won't get to search for a land card.

If the targeted land is an illegal target by the time Ghost Quarter's ability resolves, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. The land's controller won't get to search for a basic land card.

The target land's controller gets to search for a basic land card even if that land wasn't destroyed by Ghost Quarter's ability. This may happen because the land has indestructible or because it was regenerated.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Ghost Quarter: Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

foreignData.flavorText: Construido en el mismo lugar donde los Diez firmaron el Pacto entre Gremios, la torre es un monumento al pasado y un recordatorio de quién tiene el poder en el presente.
foreignData.name: Pilar de los Paruns
foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná. Usa este maná sólo para jugar un hechizo multicolor.

foreignData.flavorText: Construite à l'emplacement même où les Dix ont signé le Pacte des Guildes, la tour est un monument dédié au passé, rappelant qui a désormais le pouvoir.
foreignData.name: Pilier des Paruns
foreignData.text: {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour jouer un sort multicolore.

foreignData.flavorText: Costruita sullo stesso terreno in cui i Dieci firmarono il Patto delle Gilde, la torre è un monumento al passato e un simbolo di chi detiene il potere nel presente.
foreignData.name: Pilastro dei Paruns
foreignData.text: {T}: Aggiungi un mana di qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva. Spendi questo mana solo per giocare una magia multicolore.

foreignData.flavorText: その塔は、かの十名がギルドパクトに署名したその地に立てられ、過去の記念碑であると共に、現在の権力の所有者を示す役割を担っている。
foreignData.name: パルンズの柱
foreignData.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。 このマナは多色の呪文をプレイするためにのみ使用できる。

foreignData.flavorText: Construído no mesmo solo em que os Dez assinaram o Pacto das Guildas, a torre é um monumento ao passado e um lembrete de quem detém o poder no presente.
foreignData.name: Pilar dos Paruns
foreignData.text: {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana. Gaste este mana apenas para jogar uma mágica multicolorida.

foreignData.flavorText: Эта башня была построена на той самой земле, где Десятеро подписали Договор гильдий. Она памятник прошлому и напоминание нынешним властям.
foreignData.name: Столп Отцов
foreignData.text: {T}: Добавьте 1 ману любого цвета в свой запас маны. Тратьте эту ману только на розыгрыш многоцветных заклинаний.

foreignData.flavorText: 此塔座落于十方势力签署十会盟之地，不但是过往的纪念碑，也是现今掌权者的座右铭。
foreignData.name: 元祖柱
foreignData.text: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。 此法术力只能用来支付多色咒语的费用。

cards.name: Pillar of the Paruns
cards.originalText: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to play a multicolored spell.
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a multicolored spell.

cards.flavorText: Prahv, where much work is done to make sure nothing is accomplished.

foreignData.flavorText: In Prahv wird viel Arbeit verrichtet, um sicherzustellen, dass nichts erreicht wird.

foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.

foreignData.flavorText: Prahv, donde se trabaja mucho para asegurar que no se logre nada.

foreignData.flavorText: Prahv, où tout est mis en œuvre pour s'assurer que rien ne soit accompli.

cards.flavorText: Even miles away, if you put your ear to the sewer vents, you can hear the screams and the tempestuous laughter.

foreignData.flavorText: Selbst aus größerer Entfernung kann man noch die Schreie und das wilde Gelächter hören, wenn man sein Ohr an die Luftschächte hält.
foreignData.name: Rix Maadi, Palast aus Kerkern
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.
{1}{B}{R}, {T}: Jeder Spieler wirft eine Karte aus seiner Hand ab. Spiele diese Fähigkeit nur zu einem Zeitpunkt, zu dem du auch eine Hexerei spielen könntest.

foreignData.flavorText: Incluso alejado varios kilómetros, si acercas tu oído a la ventilación de las alcantarillas, podrás escuchar los gritos y una risa frenética.
foreignData.name: Rix Maadi, el palacio calabozo
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.
{1}{B}{R}, {T}: Cada jugador descarta una carta. Juega esta habilidad sólo cuando puedas jugar un conjuro.

foreignData.flavorText: Même à des kilomètres, si vous collez votre oreille aux bouches d'aération des égouts, vous entendez les cris et les éclats de rire.
foreignData.name: Rix Maadi, le Palais donjon
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.
{1}{B}{R}, {T} : Chaque joueur se défausse d'une carte. Ne jouez cette capacité que lorsque vous pourriez jouer un rituel.

foreignData.flavorText: Anche a chilometri di distanza, se avvicini l'orecchio agli sfiati fognari, puoi udire le urla e le risate fragorose.
foreignData.name: Rix Maadi, Palazzo Sotterraneo
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.
{1}{B}{R}, {T}: Ogni giocatore scarta una carta. Gioca questa abilità solo quando potresti giocare una stregoneria.

foreignData.flavorText: 下水溝に耳をつければ、何マイル先からでさえも叫び声と騒がしい笑い声が聞こえる。
foreignData.name: 迷宮の宮殿、リックス・マーディ
foreignData.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。
{1}{B}{R}, {T}：各プレイヤーはカードを１枚捨てる。 この能力は、あなたがソーサリーをプレイできるときにのみプレイできる。

foreignData.flavorText: Mesmo a quilômetros de distância, se você colocar os ouvidos nas saídas do esgoto, poderá ouvir os gritos e a gargalhada tempestuosa.
foreignData.name: Rix Maadi, Palácio da Masmorra
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.
{1}{B}{R}, {T}: Cada jogador alvo descarta um card. Use esta habilidade somente quando puder jogar um feitiço.

foreignData.flavorText: Даже если вы от него на расстоянии многих миль, сквозь сточные отверстия все равно можно услышать стоны и громовые раскаты хохота.
foreignData.name: Рикс Маади, Дворец темниц
foreignData.text:
{T}: Добавьте {1} в свой запас маны.
{1}{B}{R}, {T}: Каждый игрок сбрасывает карту. Разыгрывайте эту способность только тогда, когда можно разыгрывать заклинания волшебства.

foreignData.flavorText: 如果你将耳朵贴近下水道口，即使在数哩之外都能听到惨叫与狂笑。

foreignData.text:

cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}{B}{R}, {T}: Each player discards a card. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.

rulings.text: When the second ability resolves, first the active player chooses a card to discard, then the nonactive player chooses, then all chosen cards are discarded at the same time. No one sees what the other players are discarding before deciding which cards to discard.
